title: Power sector regulator CERC’s proposal to revamp transmission connectivity faces pushback from renewable energy industry
full_text: Power sector regulator CERC’s proposal to revamp transmission connectivity faces pushback from renewable energy industry. The proposals come against the backdrop of around 31.8 gigawatts (GW) of renewable capacity that has already been granted connectivity but is yet to secure PPAs, leading to underutilisation of transmission infrastructure..
